name: 'Fundi' Driver
description:
'Fundi' Driver is game where you play as a South African taxi driver.

Just like real South African taxi drivers you must get to your destination as quickly as possible with little regard as to the safety of your fellow drivers.

Each round a destination with be picked by random from a few buildings on the outer edge of the city, you must get there as quickly as possible and it doesn't matter how many NPCs you kill.

Fundi means expert in South African slang.

You can submit your score by clicking the button in-game. You can see it at https://www.curia-studios.co.za/fundidriverscores.
